document_data.name: Gellana Mirrorshade
document_data.mainbody: '''Gellana Mirrorshade''' was a cleric of [[Garl Glittergold]] in  the [[Friendly Arm Inn]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Gellana managed the local temple to Garl and helped her husband [[Bentley Mirrorshade]] to run the inn. She also maintained the inn's garden.
document_data.Personality: Gellana always tried to see the larger picture involving people while Bentley unveiled their schemes. She had built many walls to protect the inn from any attack.
document_data.Relationship: Gellana was considered a model figure to inspire all young female [[gnome]]s in the [[Realms]].
